title: Bug 11994StyledText  replace getXAtOffset(caretOffset) with caret.getLocation().x
description: Bug 11994StyledTextreplace getXAtOffset(caretOffset) with caret.getLocation().x build 20020319In a number of places we get the location of the caret by calling getXAtOffset(caretOffset).I haven't looked at the code but we may be able to replace this with a call tocaret.getLocation().x.
OB: This won't be possible though if the caret is null(i.e., when there is no caret).
EB: We could at least optimize the case when thereis a caret.
